about.text:
LightClip v{version}
— Lightweight Clipboard Manager —

Main features:
• Auto-save clipboard history (text / image / URLs)
• Pin important items so they are never trimmed
• Search, copy, and preview clipboard entries
• Template manager: add / edit / delete / double-click to edit / one-click copy
• Template editor: name + copy button on the same row, preview area below
• Multiple visual themes (dark / light) with 18px text
• Multi-language (Traditional Chinese / English)
• Cloud sync: export JSON into cloud/ folder
• System tray support

For personal productivity use.
